comment:
This is a whiskey that you do not taste unnoticed. Flavour comes in quickly and stays long and intense.
A joy to drink.
A good cask strength whisky for sure.  Well priced and delivers a real punch of flavour.  Quite a bit of heat indicates fairly young whisky.
Sweet and distinctly creamy start, then the fire comes. Fantastic with a rock and optionally a small dash of water.
Lovely whisky i rate this about on par with the abundah. Fruity on the nose heaps of sherry I get plums a big sweet sherry hit on the palate with a long spicy finish 🖒
Batch 004 (8.20.17). Pretty "in your face" all around. Will give you a pick me up. Not subtle. Not complicated.

I've got a batch 4 bottle.

Nosing it I get a tart winey smell, with icing sugar developing after a while. strong alcohol throughout.

taste is firey, very very rich. Oak-y, charr, banana and spice. it finishes prickly but a banana charr taste stays on the palate for a while.
High vanilla to the nose. First sip you can definitely tell the high alcohol - ethanol taste. Watered down is a better. Might buy again
Rich full spicy flavor flat finish
Had at a tasting. Was strong and very delicious.
Spicy, cinnamon. Some fruit. Honey. Overpowering spice. Cask Strength really takes it up a notch.
veldig sterk og litt stram, men fremdeles preget av en mild glengoyne smak
